mapper.update:
update es_user
cs_id = #{csId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update es_user set cs_id = #{csId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_pwd = #{uPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_sex = #{uSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_phone = #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_creatime = #{uCreatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, u_avaiable = #{uAvaiable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from es_user
and u_id like concat("%",#{uId},"%")
and u_name like concat("%",#{uName},"%")
and cs_id like concat("%",#{csId},"%")
and u_phone like concat("%",#{uPhone},"%")
and u_sex = #{uSex}
